EmailTemplate.name: Indeed Response Message
EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto Solar - We'd like to Partner with Company Name
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for expressing interest in our posting. I'd like to arrange a time to discuss the opportunity to work with Palmetto in more detail. When you have a moment, use the meeting link below to view my availability and book time directly on my calendar. You'll be sent an invite with a Zoom meeting link shortly thereafter for our conversation.
https://calendly.com/mike-schamp/45min. I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Cheers, Mike Schamp Senior Manager - Build Partner 781-439-5572
